title: Matrix Rank Quiz
description: Test your understanding of matrix rank and its properties.

questions.question: What is the rank of a matrix?
options: The dimension of the column space
questions.explanation: The rank is the dimension of the column space (or row space).

questions.question: For any matrix A, rank(A) ≤ min(m, n) where m×n is the size. This is:
questions.explanation: The rank cannot exceed the smaller dimension.

questions.question: What is the rank of a zero matrix?
If A is m×n and rank(A) = r, then:
options: The nullity is m + n - r
questions.explanation: By rank-nullity theorem, rank + nullity = n.

questions.question: For matrices A and B, rank(AB) ≤ min(rank(A), rank(B)). This is:
questions.explanation: Sylvester's inequality bounds the rank of a product.
